home.title: Game Hub
home.subtitle: Pick a game to play. Made by the Thomas Family (with some help from AI).
home.tip: Tip: bookmark /sudoku to jump straight into Sudoku.

sudoku.name: Sudoku
sudoku.description: Classic 9×9 puzzle with timer and leaderboard.
sudoku.title: Sudoku
sudoku.subtitle: Challenge your mind with this classic puzzle game
sudoku.select_difficulty: Select difficulty to start a new game
sudoku.no_scores: No scores yet. Complete a puzzle to get on the board!
sudoku.instruction_1: Fill the 9×9 grid so that each row, column, and 3×3 box contains digits 1-9
sudoku.instruction_2: Click on a cell and type a number to fill it (1-9)
sudoku.instruction_3: Press 0 or Backspace to clear a cell
sudoku.instruction_4: Click "Check" to validate your solution when complete

dots_and_boxes.name: Dots and Boxes
dots_and_boxes.description: Draw lines, complete boxes, and rack up points.
dots_and_boxes.title: Dots and Boxes
dots_and_boxes.subtitle: Two players take turns drawing lines. Complete a box to score and play again.
dots_and_boxes.click_to_draw: Click near a segment to draw it.
dots_and_boxes.tip: Tip: aim near a gap between two dots. Completing a box gives you another turn.
dots_and_boxes.mobile_tip: Tip: tap near a gap between two dots. Completing a box gives you another turn.
dots_and_boxes.rule_2: Finish a box to claim it.
dots_and_boxes.rule_3: If you claim a box, you play again.
dots_and_boxes.rule_4: Game ends when all boxes are claimed.

connect_four.name: Connect Four
connect_four.description: Drop pieces and get four in a row to win.
connect_four.title: Connect Four
connect_four.subtitle: Drop pieces and get four in a row to win.
connect_four.rule_1: Take turns dropping pieces into columns.
connect_four.rule_2: Get four pieces in a row to win.

minesweeper.name: Minesweeper
minesweeper.title: Minesweeper
minesweeper.subtitle: Find all the mines without detonating any.
minesweeper.click_instructions: Left-click to reveal, right-click to flag.

rules.title: Rules
rules.win: Reveal all non-mine cells to win.
rules.lose: Hit a mine and you lose!

chess.name: Chess
chess.title: Chess
chess.subtitle: Classic strategy game with move highlighting.
chess.rule_2: Click a piece to select it, then click destination.
chess.rule_3: Capture enemy pieces by landing on them.

kenken.name: KenKen
kenken.title: KenKen
kenken.subtitle: Fill the grid with numbers following the arithmetic rules.
kenken.rule_1: Fill each row and column with unique numbers.
kenken.rule_2: Cages show arithmetic operations that must equal the target.
kenken.rule_4: Single cells contain their own value.
kenken.rule_5: Use numbers 1 through N where N is the grid size.

solitaire.name: Solitaire
solitaire.description: Jump over marbles to remove them.
solitaire.title: Solitaire
solitaire.subtitle: Jump over marbles to remove them from the board.
solitaire.rule_1: Click a marble to select it.
solitaire.rule_2: Click an empty hole to jump over an adjacent marble.
solitaire.rule_3: The jumped marble is removed from the board.
solitaire.rule_4: Continue until only one marble remains.

common.click_to_place: Click a square to place your mark.
common.keyboard_help: Keyboard: Use Tab/Shift+Tab to focus a cell, then press Enter/Space to play.
common.first_to_three: First to get 3 in a row wins.
common.draw_if_full: If all squares fill with no winner: draw.
